name: Salsa Verde With Nuts
recipeIngredient: 1 anchovy, preferably packed in salt, rinsed and cleaned
3/4 cup olive oil, more or less
1/4 cup chopped or slivered almonds, preferably toasted

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor or with a mortar and pestle, pulse or pound the anchovy and garlic to a paste, then add capers, and then the herbs until everything is coarsely pureed. Be careful not to overprocess.
Add the olive oil a bit at a time until mixture is smooth and saucy. Taste, and add more oil if necessary. Stir in nuts, and serve with fish.
